price: Ai (Faraoni) u shmang (nga besimi), së bashku me komandantët e vet dhe tha: “Musai është magjistar ose i çmendur!”
arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكۡنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَٰحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: fatawallā biruk'nihi waqāla sāḥirun aw majnūnun
